payments.title: Credit in XEX
payments.description: Upload any amount of XEX to pay for game. Get instant, free withdrawls

functions.name: play
functions.function: To play a hand of Tripple It! A random number will be drawn for you between 0-99.
inputHelp: Amount of XEX to play with (without decimals). You must have balance to play

functions.name: getResult
functions.function: To get the result of the last play
outputHelp: Random number picked by the blockchain. 0-32: You win. 33-99: You lose

functions.name: withdraw
inputHelp: Amount of XEX (without decimals) to withdraw
